title: Relates to preventing the unnecessary removal of children from a custodial parent who is the victim of domestic violence
summary: Amends provisions of child protective proceedings to prevent the unnecessary removal of children from a custodial parent who is the victim of domestic violence.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the social services law, in relation to preventing the unnecessary removal of children from a custodial parent who is the victim of domestic violence without further evidence of neglect by such parent
